title: Behind Behani
overview: In an eight-part series, recording artist Rebekah "Behani" Behbahani shares the highs and lows of pursuing music stardom on a global stage, while learning to balance motherhood, her love-life, and everything in-between.  Having already caught the attention of chart-topping musicians and producers abroad, collaborating with GRAMMY® Award-winning artists DJ Khaled and Ne-Yo, Behani's profile continues to rise. In true popstar fashion, Behani along with her fiancé, prominent investor and philanthropist Alex Waislitz (OAM), and their daughter Storm jet between Melbourne and the United States in pursuit of Behani's relentless ambition to succeed as an artist and businesswoman managing her music career. Already making her mark in Australia, Behani has released five singles which have amassed over 10 million streams. Her debut single Real Man featuring R&B star Ne-Yo catapulted into the pop stratosphere and was soon followed by Medicine, Pretty Beast, Again & Again, Do It and Comfortable featuring Tyga. Behani will be opening for Ne-Yo on his upcoming arena tour across Australia and New Zealand, performing for some of the biggest audiences of her career.
